sql:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM title t, cast_info ci, movie_info mi
WHERE t.id = ci.movie_id AND t.id = mi.movie_id AND t.kind_id  >  4 AND t.production_year  =  1974 AND ci.person_id  >  2713942 AND ci.role_id  >  8 AND mi.info_type_id  <  2
